heroDescription: Want to stand out in the quantum universe? Join LACQ Feynman!
universitiesDescription: Bring your institution to participate in the National Quantum Computing League.
aboutTitle: We are part of Quantum Coalition
aboutDescription: LACQ Feynman is part of Quantum Coalition, a global network of university clubs that promotes accessibility, diversity and community in quantum computing.
missionText1: Founded in 2024 at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS), LACQ Feynman was born with the purpose of promoting research and training in quantum computing.
missionText2: We seek to connect emerging talents with the future of quantum technologies, building a vibrant ecosystem of learning and innovation.
opportunitiesResearchDescription: Work on quantum algorithms, applications and theories in projects with professors and professionals.
opportunitiesWorkshopsDescription: Learn quantum computing from basic concepts to programming on platforms like Qiskit and Cirq.
opportunitiesCareerDescription: Secure positions at research centers and partner startups through our network of connections.
contactDescription: We are here to clarify your doubts, hear suggestions or start a collaboration with the National Quantum Computing League.
joinUsDescription: Discover the benefits of being part of an innovative, collaborative and passionate community about quantum computing.
pioneerTitle: Be Part of a Pioneering Movement
pioneerText: Join a community at the forefront of quantum computing research and innovation. As a member of LACQ Feynman, you will be part of a group dedicated to exploring revolutionary technologies that will shape the future of computing.
researchText: Participate in advanced projects and research in quantum computing, contributing to innovations that are changing the world. LACQ Feynman offers a platform for students and professionals to explore new ideas and generate real impact.
educationText: We offer workshops, lectures and courses to equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in quantum computing. Whether you are just starting or already experienced, our educational programs will boost your advancement.
networkingText: LACQ Feynman connects you to experts, industry professionals and other students, promoting collaboration opportunities and knowledge exchange. Build relationships that will boost your academic and professional growth.
errorDescription: There was a problem processing your request. Please try again.
signupFormDescription: Sign up to our platform to access exclusive resources and connect with the quantum computing community.
patronTitle: Why is Richard Feynman our patron?
patronPioneerText: Feynman was one of the first to propose using quantum systems to simulate quantum phenomena, laying the foundations for what we now know as quantum computing.
patronPopularizationText: With his unique talent for explaining complex concepts clearly and accessibly, Feynman inspired students and scientists, aligning with our mission to democratize knowledge.
patronCuriosityText: Feynman was known for his insatiable curiosity and for connecting different areas of knowledge, reflecting quantum computing's collaborative spirit.
patronBrazilText: Feynman had great affection for Brazil and used to play samba in circles in Rio de Janeiro, reinforcing his cultural and human bond with the country.
valuesSubtitle: Passion for shaping the future through knowledge, innovation and collaboration.
valuesVisionText: At LACQ Feynman, we seek to connect academics and professionals passionate about quantum computing, promoting a collaborative environment that drives future technologies.
valuesResearchText: We are dedicated to advancing cutting-edge research in quantum computing, exploring innovative solutions to solve some of the most complex challenges in the field.
valuesEducationText: We offer a wide variety of educational opportunities, including workshops, lectures and courses, to empower the next generation of leaders and quantum computing specialists.
valuesNetworkingText: LACQ Feynman acts as a hub for connecting students, teachers and industry professionals, promoting impactful partnerships and knowledge exchange.
valuesInnovationText: Our projects aim to push the boundaries of quantum computing, developing practical applications capable of revolutionizing industries and technologies.
valuesCollaborationText: We believe in the power of collaboration, uniting diverse minds to foster creativity and accelerate advances in quantum computing research.
pastEventsSubtitle: Check out the events we held in 2024.
event1Description: LACQ Feynman participated in the Data Science Summit 2024, exploring the intersection of data science and quantum technologies. The event brought together experts to discuss the future of information processing and how quantum algorithms can revolutionize big data analysis.
event2Description: The VII Quantum Computing Workshop at UFSC brought together experts from academia and industry to discuss advances in the field. The event featured lectures on variational algorithms, quantum machine learning, and immersive virtual reality demonstrations.
event3Description: Venturus' Summer School in Quantum Computing was supported by LACQ and was a success! Students were able to delve into complex physical and computational themes, in addition to developing code in IBM's Qiskit.
event4Description: Quantum Year Wrap-Up 2025 was the official closing event of the Brazilian quantum year supported by UNESCO. It featured lectures from various specialists on the subject and took place at IBM headquarters in São Paulo.
eventsComingSoon: More events will be added soon. Stay tuned.
upcomingEventsSubtitle: Stay tuned for the next events in Brazil's Quantum Computing community.
noUpcomingEventsText: New events will be announced soon. Stay tuned to our social media.
whoWeAreDescription1: The Feynman Academic League of Quantum Computing (LACQ Feynman) is a non-profit organization dedicated to democratizing Quantum Computing in Brazil. We connect students, researchers, and industry to make this technology accessible and applicable. Through courses, workshops, and scientific events, we build a diverse and technically solid community prepared to lead the country's quantum future.
whoWeAreDescription2: We act as a bridge between university, research and market, promoting activities ranging from introductory and advanced courses, practical workshops, study groups and scientific events, to extension initiatives, educational content production and articulation with national and international companies and institutions.
whoWeAreDescription3: LACQ Feynman is made up of students from different areas — such as engineering, physics, computing, mathematics and related fields — who share an interest in quantum technologies and scientific innovation. We believe that Quantum Computing is not just a topic of the future, but a strategic area of the present, with direct impacts on sectors such as industry, finance, chemistry, optimization, artificial intelligence and information security.
whoWeAreDescription4: Guided by the values of academic excellence, collaboration, inclusion and social impact, we seek to foster an open, diverse and technically solid community, prepared to contribute actively to the Brazilian and international quantum ecosystem.
whoWeAreMissionText: Democratize quantum knowledge and train people capable of leading this technological transformation.
exploreMoreSubtitle: Curated content to boost your learning.
whyLACQFSubtitle: Discover the exclusive benefits of being a member of our academic league.
joinCommunitySubtitle: Be part of the quantum revolution. One account, access to the entire ecosystem.
whatsappGroupCTA: Join our WhatsApp group and connect with other enthusiasts!
